name: Editor's Choice
overview: Create a Netflix-style featured content slider on the main page.
description:
Create a Netflix-style featured content slider on the main page.

https://github.com/lachlandcp/jellyfin-editors-choice-plugin

versions.changelog: Fixes issue preventing Collections mode from working

Updates compatability with FileTransformation. Fixes bug where un-rated items don't show despite minimum rating filter set to zero. Fixes bug loading on some TVs, adds option to hide slider on TV mode.

Improves function of 'new mode'. TV shows with an end date within the selected time period will be included. Restores 'open in new tab' ability to slider. Replaces 1.3.1.0 release which also: Improves FileTransformation mode reliability, adds heading option, and adds more options to 'New' mode
Adds integration with the FileTransformation plugin for easier installation.
Adds options to exclude played items, and configure the height of the slider.
Stylistic corrections and compatability with ElegantFin.
Re-release of 1.1.0.1 to fix versioning. Removes image resizing as default to improve plugin performance.
Adds new 'recent releases' mode, localisation for 'Watch' button, option to change autoplay interval, and options to show description and rating or not.
New and improved slider! Including autoplay, looping, and improved loading reliability
Allows filtering by library, adds 'Collections' mode, speeds up load times, and improves config UI
Allows filtering by minimum community or critic rating! And fixes slider on Jellyfin Android app
This version greatly improves the mechanism to load the slider, so that it is faster and more reliable.

Now works with Jellyfin 10.10.x. Other changes in this version include: Users can now only see items from libraries that they have permission to access. The option to show a particular number of items applies to 'favourites' mode as well as random mode. Slider will not show IMDB ratings if unavailable. Scroller buttons adjusted to stand out more on light background.
Fix bug where only admins can load the editors choice slider.
Update for Jellyfin 10.9 and fix package versions for 10.9.1 to 10.9.3
Fix issues with favourited seasons/episodes and exclude other unsupported favouritable items

versions.changelog:
修复 Jellyfin 10.11.0 中遇到的一些小问题

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/compare/1.7.3...1.7.4

## 支持 Jellyfin 10.11

注：如需使用 10.10 及更早的版本，请到 Release 中下载老版本

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/compare/1.7.2...1.7.3

注：这可能是最后一个支持 Jellyfin 10.10 的版本，目前看来 Jellyfin 10.11 API 有变化，待正式版发布后插件会及时适配

## What's Changed
* fix: More robust error message matching by @RandomNamer in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/195
* feat: add collection by subject's relation by @chu-shen in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/160
* feat: add ui for controlling rating refresh intervals by @RandomNamer in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/203
* feat: try match following seasons by name when first season is not pr… by @RandomNamer in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/202
* Fix：部分文件季号刮削错误 by @wsgh0202 in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/208
* refactor: separate the basic parser by @chu-shen in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/163
* refactor: extract local configuration handling to LocalConfigurationH… by @chu-shen in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/210

## New Contributors
* @wsgh0202 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/208

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/compare/1.7.1...1.7.2

## What's Changed

- 优化离线数据库更新逻辑
- 近期放送的剧集始终使用在线 API 获取
- 增加 [公共标签](https://bgm.tv/group/topic/406595) 支持
- 修复 OAuth 授权时间显示不正确的问题（不影响正常使用）
- 修正查询图片时没有携带登录态的问题 #181
- 代码结构 / 打包流程调整 #159 

最新 CI 测试包可以在 https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/releases/tag/ci 下载

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/compare/1.7.0...1.7.1

## Important
 - 支持 Jellyfin 10.10.0（向下兼容 10.9.0）
 - [离线数据库](https://github.com/bangumi/Archive/) 支持：
   - 当存在离线数据时库时，优先通过离线数据库查询
   - 默认每周更新一次，可在 Jellyfin - 计划任务 中自行修改
   - 离线数据库下载解压过程需要占用约 1GB 内存，索引过程需要占用大量 CPU 资源。\
     （作为参考 M2 Mac 需要约 3 分钟，16 核的 Epyc 需要几十秒）
   - 一定程度解决 bgm.tv 挂掉或被墙导致的报错

## What's Changed
* do not use series overview when the episode overview is empty by @huihuimoe in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/154
* fix: characters sort by relation by @chu-shen in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/156
* feat: update Anitomy by @chu-shen in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/157
* Feat sort by fuzzy by @chu-shen in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/158
* fix: return all subjects after sorted by fuzzy by @chu-shen in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/161

## New Contributors
* @huihuimoe made their first contribution in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/154

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/compare/1.6.2...1.7.0

## Important
 - 增加了 API 地址修改功能，但还是建议给 Jellyfin 挂梯子
 - 现在修改设置后需要手动点击保存按钮

## What's Changed
* fix: fix movie play status syncing in JF movie libraries by @RandomNamer in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/136
* feat: traversal searching for next season by @RandomNamer in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/135
* fix error when season folder not exists by @fiochen in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/141
* append available access token for emby

## New Contributors
* @RandomNamer made their first contribution in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/136

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/compare/1.6.1...1.6.2

## What's Changed
* 修正登录授权地址错误

## What's Changed
* **升级至 Jellyfin 10.9.0**
* 增加季 ID 自动推算能力
* 新的搜索接口
* fix: empty exception message by @fiochen in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/75
* feat: force episode for subject with single ep by @everpcpc in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/95
* Skip OVA in GuessNextSeason by @zeyugao in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/118
* 支持Emby自动点格子 by @zeyugao in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/108
* 切换到 Github Actions

> [!WARNING]
> 由于 Jellyfin API 变化，1.6.0 版本起不再支持 Jellyfin 10.8.13 及以下版本
> 另外 10.9.0 也无法使用旧版本插件，请使用这个版本
>
> Emby 版本需要升级至 4.9.0.12 以上

## New Contributors
* @zeyugao made their first contribution in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/118

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/compare/1.5.18...1.6.0

## What's Changed
* feat: support parsing bangumi id from path attribute by @everpcpc in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/62
* 更换章节收藏信息API by @fiochen in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/65
* fix: 重复标记已观看时，同步api检查状态 by @fiochen in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/67
* feat: 设置节目到'在看/看过' by @fiochen in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/66

## New Contributors
* @everpcpc made their first contribution in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/62
* @fiochen made their first contribution in https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/pull/65

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/compare/1.5.0...1.5.18

- 增加 NSFW 内容标记
  - 在 bangumi 上标记为 NSFW 的番剧会被分级至 X
  - 可通过 jellyfin 自带家长控制功能限制
  - 默认禁用 NSFW 内容播放进度同步
    - 需要手动修改或刷新元数据使分级为 `JP-18+` `NC-17` 或更高
    - 各地区分级可见：https://github.com/jellyfin/jellyfin/tree/master/Emby.Server.Implementations/Localization/Ratings
- 增加对音乐和书籍的识别能力 #29 #38
- 增加接口超时时间设置
- 修正部分设置修改后需要重启才能生效的问题
- 优化特别篇（SP）识别能力
- 优化集号识别准确度
- 优化词条搜索逻辑 by @chu-shen #23
- 修正词条搜索时上映时间不正确的问题 by @RanKKI #31 
- 同步电视分类元数据识别逻辑至电影分类 by @wzyboy #46

- 支持通过 [Anitomy](https://github.com/erengy/anitomy) 解析番剧名称和级号 #15 by @chu-shen 
- 修正集数大于 100 时可能的死循环 #19

此版本主要为 bugfix
- 提升 SP / OP / ED 的识别能力
- 支持非整数集（比如某些番剧的 12.5 集）的识别
- 修正授权跳转地址不正确的问题

#10 #11 #13 #14

从此版本起可以支持将多季动漫收至单文件夹，可与 TheMovieDB 配合一起使用

新的目录结构：https://github.com/kookxiang/jellyfin-plugin-bangumi/wiki/%E5%8F%82%E8%80%83%E7%9B%AE%E5%BD%95%E7%BB%93%E6%9E%84

由于 bangumi 不支持查询动漫第 n 季的 id，使用时这种方式时需要手动填写季 id

其他更新内容

 - 升级到 .Net Core 6.0，对应 Jellyfin 10.8
 - 修复只能搜索到前 100 集的 bug #7
 - 修正 R18 动漫无法查看的 bug（需要账号授权） #9 
 - 优化搜索结果排序 #8 

注意：

1. 请下载 Fastenshtein.dll 一同放置在插件目录，否则搜索功能不可用
2. jellyfin 10.7 的用户请下载 `Jellyfin.Plugin.Bangumi.net50.dll` 插件，这会是最后一个支持 10.7 的版本，后续更新将不在支持老版本

支持 Jellyfin 10.8.0 Beta
升级到 .net core 6.0 （与新版 jellyfin 一致）

- 更新集号识别逻辑

同步测试版更新：

- 增加 OAuth 登录功能
- 同步播放进度至 bgm.tv

- 增加 OAuth 登录功能
- 同步播放进度至 bgm.tv

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2725379/158064318-98a82a79-a783-4552-abaa-af18724ad9bf.png)

PS：支持多用户，但受 Jellyfin 插件机制限制，暂时需要管理员权限才能绑定账号

- 切换至新的角色声优 API
- 设置中增加【始终根据文件名猜测集数】用于纠正错误识别的集数
- 空指针 bugfix

- 自动纠正 Jellyfin 识别错误的集号
- 增加 Movie 分类支持，用于支持剧场版动画
- 更换 bgm.tv 新 API （角色声优信息除外）
在 TV Show 中现在可以看到 Bangumi 的元数据下载器

# Self Service: 

* Users can link existing jellyfin accounts to SSO provider accounts
* Users can remove existing links
* Users can configure multiple SSO provider accounts
* Account names no longer have to match across Jellyfin -> SSO provider
  * Eg, can link google OIDC, with a `sub` of `asfbeausfahgajsfjasd-ugly-sub` to jellyfin username `matthew`

## What's Changed

### Features

* Implement Canonical Linking + Self Service by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/34

name: Authelia Authentication
description:
Authenticate your Jellyfin with Authelia, and optionally create users who do not yet exist automatically.

This plugin uses Authelia HTTP API for authentication. Unlike with an SSO plugin, this allows using the existing Jellyfin login UI and API, which is compatible with all existing Jellyfin clients.
The main drawback of this approach is that 2FA is not supported.


https://github.com/nikarh/jellyfin-plugin-authelia
overview: Authenticate users via Authelia

versions.changelog:
### Added
- Added a new field to manage Jellyfin administrator privilege for users authorized with this plugin

### Changed
- Simplified authentication by 1 HTTP call, extracting full name from `Remote-Name` header instead of an additional call to `/api/user/info`

### Fixed
- Latest version didn't work with Jellyfin 10.8.0 

### Added
- A new configuration param for a custom root CA certificate
- A new configuration param to enable/disable user creation on login

A Jellyfin plugin to integrate [Jellyfin](https://jellyfin.org/docs/) with [Shoko Server](https://shokoanime.com/downloads/shoko-server/).

**This plugin requires that you have already set up and are using Shoko Server**, and that the files you intend to include in Jellyfin are **indexed** (and optionally managed) by Shoko Server. **Otherwise, the plugin won't be able to provide metadata for your files**, since there is no metadata to find for them.

name: Spotify Import
description:
This plugin enables you to import playlists from Spotify to your Jellyfin server automatically. It provides a scheduled task that queries a given list of Spotify playlists and tries to recreate them as best as possible in Jellyfin.


https://github.com/Viperinius/jellyfin-plugin-spotify-import
overview: This plugin imports playlists from Spotify.

versions.changelog:
# Changelog

## [1.15.1.0] - 2025-10-21

### Changed

- Replace the default URL for Spotify TOTP

# Changelog

## [1.15.0.0] - 2025-10-01

### Added

- Also ignore diacritics when using match level Ignore Punctuation + Case (or further relaxed levels)

### Changed

- Manual map interface now allows pasting in JSON (e.g. missing tracks file entries)
- Manual map entries can now be specified either be the previous information or just using the Spotify track ID / URI, similar to how playlist URIs are handled when configuring the plugin

# Changelog

## [1.14.1.0] - 2025-09-13

### Fixed

- Excessive memory use when updating the ISRC / MusicBrainz cache in some situations

# Changelog

## [1.14.0.0] - 2025-09-12

### Added

- New matching method via MusicBrainz and ISRC IDs
- The plugin settings page now contains a checkbox to activate the new MusicBrainz matching method
- Support for the import of the "Liked Songs" section from Spotify

### Changed

- The current scopes of the Spotify auth token are now displayed on the plugin settings page

# Changelog

## [1.13.1.0] - 2025-08-14

### Fixed

- Fix missing progress reporting of import task
- Fix wrong parameters for some logging entries (see issue #63)
- Fix procedure to aquire auth token for alternative Spotify provider after recent changes made by Spotify (again)

# Changelog

## [1.13.0.0] - 2025-03-24

### Added

- Caching of Spotify playlists (only query the full track data if the playlist state changed)
- Caching of track matches (reuse match of a track for all occurrences across playlists)

### Fixed

- Fix procedure to aquire auth token for alternative Spotify provider after recent changes made by Spotify (again)

# Changelog

## [1.12.4.0] - 2025-03-11

### Fixed

- Fix procedure to aquire auth token for alternative Spotify provider after recent changes made by Spotify

# Changelog

## [1.12.3.0] - 2025-01-25

### Fixed

- Fix manual track map path not being found depending on the plugin location
- Fix exception handling if the manual track map does not exist yet

# Changelog

## [1.12.2.0] - 2025-01-07

### Fixed

- Fix parsing of empty artist fields when adding manual map entries

# Changelog

## [1.12.1.0] - 2024-12-08

### Fixed

- Fix missing handling of request timeouts when using the alternative Spotify provider

# Changelog

## [1.12.0.0] - 2024-12-07

### Added

- Workaround regarding the recent Spotify API changes (#48)

# Changelog

## [1.11.0.0] - 2024-11-30

### Added

- Support for manually mapping tracks between Spotify and Jellyfin (#44)

### Fixed

- Keep iterating through artists even after a first match was found (in case multiple artists with the same name exist)
- Fix exception getting user playlists due to changes in the Spotify API (#46)

# Changelog

## [1.10.0.0] - 2024-09-14

### Added

- New option to set playlists as private or public to all users

### Fixed

- Exception if Spotify returns duplicate playlists for a user

# Changelog

## [1.9.0.0] - 2024-08-25

### Added

- New setting to enable imported "progress" to be displayed in the playlist description -> #30
- New matching type to extract an album name from the track name (like 'Track [From "An Album"]') and use that for comparison

### Changed

- Updated Jellyfin dependencies to match version 10.9.9
- Switch request handling on plugin config page to use jellyfin custom fetch mechanism

# Changelog

## [1.8.1.1] - 2024-06-21

### Fixed

- Include missing Fastenshtein dependency in build artifacts

# Changelog

## [1.8.1.0] - 2024-05-19

### Fixed

- Broken API endpoints (due to authorisation policy changes in Jellyfin introduced in 10.9)

# Changelog

## [1.8.0.0] - 2024-05-17

### Added

- Support for Jellyfin 10.9
- New configurable flag for each playlist whether or not to recreate it from scratch each time the task runs
- New matching type "fuzzy checking" for track and album names

### Changed

- "Ignore Parentheses" now treats [] the same as ()
- Some rework of the track matching process (again); the plugin now tries to find all potential matches first and then decides a "best fit" track name

# Changelog

## [1.7.2.0] - 2024-03-29

### Fixed

- Accept matches where Spotify uses a different track syntax than metadata providers (e.g. "Track Name - Super Remix" on Spotify and "Track Name (Super Remix)" on MusicBrainz) if at least match level `Ignore Case + Punctuation` is used

# Changelog

## [1.7.1.0] - 2024-03-18

### Changed

- Reintroduce the old track matching method as a configurable legacy alternative (not recommended to be used)
- Extend logging information / debug possibilities

# Changelog

## [1.7.0.0] - 2024-03-10

### Changed

- If a track / album / artist contains text in parentheses, this content will be used as another match candidate (e.g. to match tracks that have an english translation of a foreign name)

### Fixed

- Fix broken track matching if multiple artists of a track exist in Jellyfin, but the track is not located under the first existing artist
- Fix not matching tracks if their album is not a direct child of their artist and (for whatever reason) only detectable via the album artist

# Changelog

## [1.6.0.0] - 2024-02-23

### Changed

- Search Jellyfin server for artist instead of individual tracks and narrow track matching down from there
- Search Jellyfin server using only the first few characters of an artist name to increase chances of finding matches with slightly different names
- Use all (album) artists from Spotify to check whether a matching artist exists in Jellyfin, not just the first one

### Fixed

- Catch exceptions from Spotify API lib when retrieving users / playlists

# Changelog

## [1.5.0.0] - 2023-12-16

### Added

- New switch to control where missing track files are stored
- Add new matcher to ignore anything in parentheses in track/album/artist names

### Fixed

- Fix Spotify username regex not allowing special characters

# Changelog

## [1.4.0.0] - 2023-10-15

### Added

- Auto-migration of plugin configurations from previous plugin versions
- More verbose logging that can be enabled

### Changed

- Reworked handling of Spotify user IDs to get all their playlists (moved to its own table separate from individual playlist IDs)

### Fixed

- Fix bug in config page that reset all unsaved table row states when adding a new row
- Fix parsing of Spotify URLs that contain parameters

# Changelog

## [1.3.0.0] - 2023-08-13

### Added

- Extend playlist configuration by allowing user IDs as input, which leads to all of their playlists getting imported automatically

### Fixed

- Fix exception if a Spotify track contains no album artists metadata

# Changelog

## [1.2.0.0] - 2023-07-01

### Added

- Extend playlist configurability
  - Allow own playlist names
  - Set target owner / user
- Allow configuration of the track matcher
  - Choose comparison strictness
  - Choose what parts of the metadata get examined / compared

# Changelog

## [1.1.1.0] - 2023-05-06

### Fixed

- Fix exception if a Spotify playlist contains "ghost" items / null tracks
- A missing tracks file is created even though the playlist is not missing any tracks
- Fix config page not loading values when revisiting without a full page reload

# Changelog

## [1.1.0.0] - 2023-04-15

### Added

- New button to delete all generated missing tracks files
- New option to specify the date format used for missing tracks file names

### Fixed

- A missing tracks file is created even though the playlist is not missing any tracks
- Fix exception if a song has no artists, album name or album artists set

# Changelog

## [1.0.0.0] - 2023-02-26

- Initial release

### Added

- Spotify authentication via authorization code / PKCE
- Generation of missing tracks lists
- Import of Spotify playlists

name: LDAP Authentication
description:
Authenticate your Jellyfin users against an LDAP database, and optionally create users who do not yet exist automatically.

Allows the administrator to customize most aspects of the LDAP authentication process, including customizable search attributes, username attribute, and a search filter for administrative users (set on user creation). The user, via the "Manual Login" process, can enter any valid attribute value, which will be mapped back to the specified username attribute automatically as well.
overview: Authenticate users against an LDAP database

versions.changelog:
✨ New Features

- Updated to support 10.11.2

🪲 Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue where Recently Added Shows would be ordered wrong on 10.10.7 due to missing item field not being requested.

✨ New Features

- When failing to retrieve the home screen sections, instead of completely erroring, we now fallback to the default jellyfin behaviour. This should help with some issues during the install process.

🪲 Bug Fixes

- Fixed #128 where a crash was occurring when getting the Because You Watched sections
- Added logging to help diagnose the problems occurring in #125 (recently added shows appearing in the wrong order)

✨ New Features

- Added new "My Requests" section, building off the work done for the "Discover" sections, a new section is born, each user gets a row of movies/tv shows they have requested

⚡ Performance Improvements

- Minor optimisations to recently added sections
- Some of the code that handles sections has been refactored paving the way to allow the return of the heavily requested "Recently Added in {library}" sections, the default behaviour of Jellyfin.
    - Note this isn't added in this release, but soon it will be added.

🪲 Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue where Recently Added sections can duplicate content

🪲 Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue where RecentlyAddedShows section might fail when getting its results.

🪲 Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue where some installs have legacy files that are no longer used, but get hooked stopping actual files from getting hooked #118
- Fixed issue where Recently Added Shows would display in Show date added order rather than Episode date added order #120

🪲 Bug Fixes

- There was an issue that could occur with the genre section which would result in an index out of range exception and no sections would appear on the server as reported in https://github.com/IAmParadox27/jellyfin-plugin-home-sections/issues/116. This has hopefully now been fixed.

🪲 Bug Fixes

- The Watch Again section wasn't working properly, this has now been fixed

⚡ Performance Improvements

- The Watch Again section has also had some TLC to its performance. Its still not perfect but has improved on my instance from 15 seconds to 6 seconds.

⚡ Performance Improvements

- The Genre section calculation has been drastically improved (I've seen my personal speeds drop from 8 seconds to 1 second for the calculation and 3 seconds to 250 ms for the results)
- The Because you watched section has been drastically improved (I've seen my personal speeds drop from 4 seconds to 1 second for the calculation and 3 seconds to 300ms for the results)

🪲 Bug Fixes

- The Recently Added sections lost support for hiding watched content, this has now been fixed.

✨ New Features

- Music Video Sections: Added music video library support to Latest and Recently Added sections
  - Closes #101
- Added Home Screen Sections as an option on the main dashboard sidebar for quicker access to modifying the settings.

🪲 Bug Fixes

- Fixed crash that can occur with the Genre section
  - Relates to #105
- Fixed another crash that could occur relating to the users display preferences
  - Relates to #105

🚨 Breaking Change

- Please be aware that due to a crash that was sometimes occurring when the home screen sections were being requested, support for the user's "home" settings from their profile has had to be temporarily removed. It is planned to bring this back but at this stage it is unknown when this will be.

🪲 Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue where TV shows weren't able to be requested in discover sections
- Fixed issue where request responses wouldn't give user feedback when the request was successful
- Fixed a minor formatting issue on the admin config page

✨ New Features

- Genre Section: Introduced a new genre section on the home screen (details explained below).
  - Closes https://features.iamparadox.dev/posts/20/versatile-home-sections
- Support for "My Media (small)". In the plugin settings, admin's can now select "Small" as a View Mode for My Media. If it's selected by anything else, it will revert back to Landscape when loaded by the client.
  - Closes https://github.com/IAmParadox27/jellyfin-plugin-home-sections/issues/81
- Added experimental Streamyfin integration (details explained below).
  - Fulfills the remaining requirements to https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/issues/1108

🪲 Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue when requesting a Movie from Discover sections.
  - Closes https://github.com/IAmParadox27/jellyfin-plugin-home-sections/issues/96
- Fixed messaging issue that could occur from DiscoverRequest saying the item was requested successfully when an error had occurred.

🏃‍➡️ Performance and Code Improvements

- Home section calculation now uses parallelism, hopefully resulting in faster loading times on the home screen.
- Refactored some code Home screen controller code has been moved into a service for improved maintainability and easier future enhancements.

Genre Section

- This section is very early in development and may have issues, please open an issue on GitHub if you experience any issues.
- Set the number of times it should appear between 1 and N, it will appear a random number of times between those numbers.
- Each first request will calculate which Genres will appear on the home screen, this is based on a weighted scoring system that favours 'Favourites', 'Likes' and 'Recently Watched' per person. 
- A future release will bring the ability to restrict which genres are displayed, or even fix it to a certain list always, but that support is dependant on PR 70.

Streamyfin Integration

- In the Home Screen Sections plugin settings, admins will find an option to override the Streamyfin home sections with one's provided by HSS.
- Please note this requires plugin version 0.63.0.0 and a currently unreleased version of the app due to integration of a new Home Section type in Streamyfin, please be patient and wait for the release after v0.30.2 before making use of this setting.

🔒 Security Hotfix Release Notes

- Fixed issue with DiscoverRequest endpoint allowing any user to request on behalf of any user.

✨ Enhancements & Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue where TV shows couldn't be requested in discover section
- Adding ability for admins to configure whether each section should show/hide played content
- Changed Jellyseerr API key to be masked
- Fixed some issues with the cache bust text
- Added authorize to discover request fixing security vulnerability highlighted in #93
